c74object.name: zsa.fund
c74object.digest: Estimate fundamental frequency of a list of Frequency / Amplitude Pairs.
c74object.description:
zsa.fund
is based on the harmonic histogram technic described by Jean Laroche [J. Laroche, Traitement des signaux audio-fréquences,TELECOM, Handout, Paris, France, February 1995., p.52-53].
zsa.fund
is an adaptation of this method in order to approximate the result and the research phase for the “best candidate”, by a tempered musical scale with a given division (pitch grid).

method.name: list
(mouse)
method.description: Double-clicking on the object causes the Zsa Descriptors splash screen to appear. You'll find the version number and date there.

attribute.name: freqmax
attribute.description: Maximum Frequency to consider finding a fundamental. Default value 22050 Hz.

attribute.name: freqmin
attribute.description: Minimum Frequency to consider finding a fundamental. Default value 100 Hz.

attribute.name: grid
attribute.description:
grid
sets the half-tone division for a tempered chromatic scale. 1 means a half-tone pitch grid, 0.5 means a quarter-tone pitch grid, and so on.
